commentBody:
Y'know how an apology followed immediately by the conjunction "but" nullifies the apology? "Sorry I was rude, but you deserved it." This is how Mr. Rhoden's column reads - grudging admiration for the Patriots followed immediately by the impossible-to-discard spectre of videotape and underinflated footballs hanging around his neck like a battleship anchor.

I'd have more respect for this columnist if he just up and said it right out loud: "I hate and envy the success of the New England Patriots, and always will."
